Headline: #29 State Temporary Reroute at 20th/State
ShortDescription: 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Archer, Clark, Cermak and State due to, street blockage near 20th/State.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via State, Archer, Clark, Cermak and State due to, street blockage near 20th/State.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute at 20th/State

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via State, 18th, Clark and Archer due to, street blockage near 20th/State.
